languages.text: Система, в которой находятся эльдарские беженцы, расположена на краю Простора Коронус. Восстановить с ними связь не представляется возможным, потому Вольному Торговцу рекомендовано отправиться по полученным координатам лично.

traits.locale_text: Система, в которой находятся эльдарские беженцы, расположена на краю Простора Коронус. Восстановить с ними связь не представляется возможным, потому Вольному Торговцу рекомендовано отправиться по полученным координатам лично.

languages.text: The system where the Aeldari refugees are currently hiding is situated at the edge of the Koronus Expanse. Establishing contact seems impossible, so the Rogue Trader should personally head to their last known coordinates.
languages.original_text: Система, в которой находятся эльдарские беженцы, расположена на краю Простора Коронус. Восстановить с ними связь не представляется возможным, потому Вольному Торговцу рекомендовано отправиться по полученным координатам лично.

traits.locale_text: The system where the Aeldari refugees are currently hiding is situated at the edge of the Koronus Expanse. Establishing contact seems impossible, so the Rogue Trader should personally head to their last known coordinates.

The system where the Aeldari refugees are currently hiding is situated at the edge of the Koronus Expanse. Establishing contact seems impossible, so the Rogue Trader should personally head to their last known coordinates.

The system where the Aeldari refugees are currently hiding is situated at the edge of the Koronus Expanse. Establishing contact seems impossible, so the Rogue Trader should personally head to their last known coordinates.

languages.text: Le système dans lequel les réfugiés aeldaris se cachent actuellement est situé aux confins des Étendues de Koronus. Comme il semble impossible de les contacter, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit se rendre en personne à leurs dernières coordonnées connues.
languages.original_text: The system where the Aeldari refugees are currently hiding is situated at the edge of the Koronus Expanse. Establishing contact seems impossible, so the Rogue Trader should personally head to their last known coordinates.

traits.locale_text: Le système dans lequel les réfugiés aeldaris se cachent actuellement est situé aux confins des Étendues de Koronus. Comme il semble impossible de les contacter, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit se rendre en personne à leurs dernières coordonnées connues.

languages.text: 艾达灵族的幸存者目前藏身于科罗努斯扩区边缘。目前恐怕没有办法与他们取得联系，因此行商浪人只能前往最后有人目击到那些幸存者的区域。
languages.original_text: The system where the Aeldari refugees are currently hiding is situated at the edge of the Koronus Expanse. Establishing contact seems impossible, so the Rogue Trader should personally head to their last known coordinates.

traits.locale_text: 艾达灵族的幸存者目前藏身于科罗努斯扩区边缘。目前恐怕没有办法与他们取得联系，因此行商浪人只能前往最后有人目击到那些幸存者的区域。

languages.text: アエルダリ難民が現在潜んでいる星系は、コロヌス・エクスパンスの端に位置している。連絡を取るのは不可能と思われるため、自由開拓者は判明している最後の座標に自ら向かうべきだろう。
languages.original_text: The system where the Aeldari refugees are currently hiding is situated at the edge of the Koronus Expanse. Establishing contact seems impossible, so the Rogue Trader should personally head to their last known coordinates.

traits.locale_text: アエルダリ難民が現在潜んでいる星系は、コロヌス・エクスパンスの端に位置している。連絡を取るのは不可能と思われるため、自由開拓者は判明している最後の座標に自ら向かうべきだろう。

languages.text: Das System, in dem sich die Aeldari-Flüchtlinge momentan verstecken, liegt am Rande der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Es erscheint unmöglich, Kontakt aufzunehmen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} sollte sich also persönlich zu ihren letzten bekannten Koordinaten begeben.
languages.original_text: The system where the Aeldari refugees are currently hiding is situated at the edge of the Koronus Expanse. Establishing contact seems impossible, so the Rogue Trader should personally head to their last known coordinates.

traits.locale_text: Das System, in dem sich die Aeldari-Flüchtlinge momentan verstecken, liegt am Rande der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Es erscheint unmöglich, Kontakt aufzunehmen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} sollte sich also persönlich zu ihren letzten bekannten Koordinaten begeben.

languages.text: El sistema donde se ocultan los refugiados Aeldari está en los extremos de la Extensión de Koronus. Es imposible establecer contacto con ellos, por lo que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente deberá acudir personalmente a sus últimas coordenadas conocidas.
languages.original_text: The system where the Aeldari refugees are currently hiding is situated at the edge of the Koronus Expanse. Establishing contact seems impossible, so the Rogue Trader should personally head to their last known coordinates.

traits.locale_text: El sistema donde se ocultan los refugiados Aeldari está en los extremos de la Extensión de Koronus. Es imposible establecer contacto con ellos, por lo que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente deberá acudir personalmente a sus últimas coordenadas conocidas.

languages.text: Aeldari mültecilerinin şu anda gizlendiği sistem, Koronus Enginliği'nin sınırında yer alıyor. İletişim kurmak imkânsız gibi duruyor. Bu yüzden Hür Tacir, bilinen son koordinatlarına şahsen gitmeli.
languages.original_text: The system where the Aeldari refugees are currently hiding is situated at the edge of the Koronus Expanse. Establishing contact seems impossible, so the Rogue Trader should personally head to their last known coordinates.
